Sentencas: Rare earth doped ceria is a key composition for electrolyte application in SOFC.
Titulo: Effects of Gd and Sr co-doping in CeO2 for electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The present trend is to investigate the co-doping approach in ceria either to improve further the electrical conductivity or sintering property.
Titulo: Effects of Gd and Sr co-doping in CeO2 for electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: In this study, nano-structured Gd and Sr co-doped ceria (GSDC) powders have been prepared by gel combustion route.
Titulo: Effects of Gd and Sr co-doping in CeO2 for electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: In all the compositions, total dopant cation concentration has been kept at 0.20 atom fraction having general formulae Ce0.8Gd0.2-xSrxO1.9-x/2.
Titulo: Effects of Gd and Sr co-doping in CeO2 for electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: XRD patterns of GSDC powders calcined at 600 degrees C revealed the phase pure cubic fluorite structure with no Gd2O3 or SrO phase within detection limit.
Titulo: Effects of Gd and Sr co-doping in CeO2 for electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The combustion synthesized powders after sintering at 1350 degrees C resulted in pellets with density more than 96% of theoretical density.
Titulo: Effects of Gd and Sr co-doping in CeO2 for electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The total ionic conductivities have been evaluated from impedance data as a function of temperature in the range of 200-800 degrees C.
Titulo: Effects of Gd and Sr co-doping in CeO2 for electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The results indicate that ionic conductivity increases with small addition (similar to 1 mol%) of SrO. At higher SrO concentration ionic conductivity decreases and beyond about 5 mol% SrO concentration the ionic conductivity becomes lower than that of CeO2 doped with only Gd2O3.
Titulo: Effects of Gd and Sr co-doping in CeO2 for electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The decrease in ionic conductivity at higher SrO concentration has been attributed to the increase in the enthalpy of oxygen vacancy association.
Titulo: Effects of Gd and Sr co-doping in CeO2 for electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The initial increase in conductivity could be due to scavenging of siliceous phase likely to be present in the grain boundary.
Titulo: Effects of Gd and Sr co-doping in CeO2 for electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)
Effects of Gd and Sr co-doping in CeO2 for electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)
